bill_title: prohibit an adult from purchasing alcoholic beverages for anyone under the age of twenty-one and to establish a penalty.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit an adult from purchasing alcoholic beverages for anyone under the age of twenty-one and to establish a penalty. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 35-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: It is a Class 1 misdemeanor for any person twenty-one years of age or older to purchase or otherwise acquire alcoholic beverages from a retail establishment and to give or resell the alcoholic beverages to any person under the age of twenty-one years. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit an adult from purchasing alcoholic beverages for anyone under the age of twenty-one and to establish a penalty. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 35-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Except as provided in § § 35-9-1 and 35-9-1.1, it is a Class 1 misdemeanor for any person twenty-one years of age or older to purchase or otherwise acquire alcoholic beverages from a retail establishment and to give or resell the alcoholic beverages to any person under the age of twenty-one years. BILL HISTORY 1/18/00 First read in House and referred to committee assignment waived. H.J. 114 1/19/00 Referred to Judiciary. 1/28/00 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/28/00 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 10, NAYS 1. H.J. 284

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit an adult from purchasing alcoholic beverages for anyone under the age of twenty-one and to establish a penalty. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 35-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Except as provided in § § 35-9-1 and 35-9-1.1, it is a Class 2 misdemeanor for any person twenty-one years of age or older to purchase or otherwise acquire alcoholic beverages from a retail establishment and to give or resell the alcoholic beverages to any person under the age of twenty-one years. BILL HISTORY 1/18/00 First read in House and referred to committee assignment waived. H.J. 114 1/19/00 Referred to Judiciary. 1/28/00 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 1/28/00 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 10, NAYS 1. H.J. 284 2/1/00 Motion to Amend, Passed, AYES 49, NAYS 19. H.J. 351 2/1/00 House of Representatives Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 60, NAYS 8. H.J. 352

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit an adult from purchasing alcoholic beverages for anyone under the age of twenty-one and to establish a penalty. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 35-9 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Except as provided in § § 35-9-1 and 35-9-1.1, it is a Class 1 misdemeanor for any person twenty-one years of age or older to purchase or otherwise acquire alcoholic beverages from a retail establishment and to give or resell the alcoholic beverages to any person under the age of twenty-one years.
